# Summary


## Platform Sync Checklist (Required for core/adapter/platform changes)



## Documentation Layering Checklist (Required when docs or architecture changed)

- [ ] If changes touch `core` / `windows_cli` / `android_ui`, corresponding docs were updated (or marked N/A).
- [ ] New TimeTracer docs are added under one of:
  - [ ] `docs/time_tracer/core/`
  - [ ] `docs/time_tracer/windows_cli/`
  - [ ] `docs/time_tracer/android_ui/`
- [ ] If a legacy doc was edited, it includes `Status: Legacy` and links to `docs/time_tracer/README.md`.
- [ ] History updates follow `docs/time_tracer/history/README.md` (Core / Windows CLI / Android UI sections).

## Validation Notes
